name: Heartbroken (Mr.Rafael)
description:
Made for the Jame Gam #13.

your character has a crush for a girl, but he has no idea how to get there and talk to her. They're walking in a forest, the day is beautiful and there's no one around except her, and him.

Everything is perfect, he only needs one way to approach her. And so, he decided to give her an apple! What could possibly go wrong?

  • Press Spacebar to start the game.
  • Use arrow keys to move around and jump

I wish I could've made a few more levels for it, but unfortunately, I didn't have much time to work on it. But I hope you still enjoy the game regardless! :D
